original_title: Anche se volessi lavorare, che faccio?
overview: In Lazio, four young people named Riccetto, Girasole, Lallo and Tombarolo try to make a living by stealing what they find in the tombs of the rich buried. Being inexperienced, they often find themselves in trouble or pursued by the police.
title: Even If I Wanted to Work, What Do I Do?
